name: demo
description: Demo application for Web Development course
author: Jurij Cvikl <info@marcelino.si>

scripts.import:db:users: docker cp ./data/Users.json web-dev-mongo-db:/Users.json; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db mongoimport --db Library --collection Users --drop --mode upsert --upsertFields id --jsonArray --file Users.json; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db rm -rf Users.json;
scripts.import:db:types: docker cp ./data/Types.json web-dev-mongo-db:/Types.json; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db mongoimport --db Library --collection Types --drop --mode upsert --upsertFields id --jsonArray --file Types.json; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db rm -rf Types.json;
scripts.import:db:items: docker cp ./data/Items.json web-dev-mongo-db:/Items.json; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db mongoimport --db Library --collection Items --drop --mode upsert --upsertFields id --jsonArray --file Items.json; docker exec -it web-dev-mongo-db rm -rf Items.json;
scripts.import:db-docker: npm run import:db:users; npm run import:db:types; npm run import:db:items;
scripts.delete:db-docker: npm run delete:db:users; npm run delete:db:types; npm run delete:db:items;
